英文法規名稱: Charge Standards for the Collection of Campsite Rental Fees of the East Coast National Scenic Area Administration, Tourism Bureau, Ministry of Transportation and Communications
中文法規名稱: 交通部觀光局東部海岸國家風景區管理處露營區營位使用費收費標準

法規內容.條文內容: These Standards are enacted in accordance with Subparagraph 2, Paragraph 1, Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.

Users of Each Coast National Scenic Area campgrounds (Xiaoyeliu. Ruishui, Shitiping) must observe campground regulations. For both wooden tent platforms and wooden rooftop tent spaces, rental rates are NT$1,000 per night on holidays/weekends and NT$800 per night on weekdays.
The fees stipulated in these Standards will be reviewed every three years, with consideration given to such factors as changes in costs and in the consumer price index.
These Standards shall be enforced from the date of promulgation.
